scripts.build:clean: rimraf ./dist/* && yarn cpy:package && yarn react-client:build && yarn server:build
scripts.build:update: rimraf ./dist/app && rimraf ./dist/client && rimraf ./dist/index.js && rimraf ./dist/index.js.map && yarn react-client:build && yarn server:build
scripts.install: concurrently "cd server && yarn install" "cd react-client && yarn install"
scripts.server:build: cd server && yarn build && cpy **/*.* --cwd=dist ../../dist --parents && cpy **/package.production.json ../../dist
scripts.watch: concurrently "cd server && yarn watch:serve" "cd react-client && yarn start"
